value.title: Building a Virtual Relationship in Power BI   Basics of TREATAS DAX Function
value.excerpt: TreatAs is an interesting function with multiple use cases in Power BI. I thought it is good to explain it in a set of videos, the first one here is about what the TreatAs function is and how it can help to build filters and a virtual relationship between two tables. value.title: Day of Year and Day of Quarter   DAX calculations for Power BI
value.excerpt: Power BI has some built-in, easy-to-use DAX functions to get the Day of Month and Day of the week, but nothing for Day of Year and Day of the quarter. These calculations, however, are very simple and easy to implement using other functions. This short blog and video explain a method to calculate those

value.title: How to modify a linked entity in Power BI dataflows
value.excerpt: It is not possible to change a linked entity in a dataflow in Power BI. Linked entities has to be modified only in the dataflow in which they are created.
